book_name: You Are a Badass - How to Stop Doubting Your Greatness and Start Living an Awesome Life - by Jen Sincero
chapter_title: PROCRASTINATION, PERFECTION, AND A POLISH BEER GARDEN
summary: In this chapter, Sincero tackles the twin demons of procrastination and perfectionism, encouraging readers to take action despite their fears. She shares a personal story about landing a job that seemed beyond her capability, showing that often our hesitation stems more from fear than from a lack of qualifications. Sincero emphasizes the importance of starting now, rather than waiting for the perfect moment. She offers practical strategies to overcome procrastination and self-doubt, reminding us that progress is better than perfection. Ultimately, this chapter inspires us to embrace our innate abilities and pursue our dreams with vigor.

slides.section_title: Kickstarting Your Journey Begins with a Step
slides.section_body: To achieve greatness, action is essential. Often, we hesitate, thinking we're unqualified, but that’s just fear holding us back. It’s time to rise and take the leap towards your dreams.
slides.quote: In order to kick ass you must first lift up your foot.

slides.section_body: Many of us underestimate our abilities and experience. When we chase what we want, we often realize we are more capable than we ever thought. Self-doubt is a cry for us to lean into our strengths.
slides.quote: What we call unqualified is often just fear of trying.

slides.section_body: Striving for perfection can halt progress. Embrace the idea that done is better than perfect, allowing momentum to carry you forward. Every small step counts towards your greater goal.
slides.quote: Remember that done is better than perfect.

slides.section_body: Recognizing when you stall is crucial. What distracts you or makes you stop can help you strategize your path forward and keep you accountable. Self-awareness is a powerful tool.
slides.quote: Notice where you stop, and prepare for it.

slides.section_body: Find a tough accountability partner and make a bet with them to keep you on track. The fear of losing something valuable can motivate you to take action.
slides.quote: Make a bet with someone mean to hold yourself accountable.

slides.section_body: Recognize your working patterns, and instead of fighting them, utilize them to your advantage. If you work better under pressure, allow yourself leisure until the deadline approaches.
slides.quote: Own your procrastination style and work with it.

slides.section_body: Passion fuels motivation. When you genuinely care about something, the fear of failure diminishes. Let your enthusiasm push you through the tough moments.
slides.quote: Passion trumps fear; let it guide you.

slides.section_body: Excuses can trap us in a cycle of inaction. Understanding this can spur you to take decisive action. Change requires commitment to overcome the obstacles we create.
slides.quote: If you're serious about change, you'll find a way; if not, you'll find an excuse.

slides.section_body: No matter your current situation, embracing self-love is essential. Meeting yourself where you are encourages growth and progress. Celebrate every small win on your journey.
slides.quote: Love yourself right now, wherever you're at.

slides.section_body: Don’t wait for the perfect circumstances; start today! Challenges may come, but each step forward brings you closer to your dreams. Remember, time is a precious resource.
slides.quote: Just start. Now. Do whatever it takes.
